name: Somdyuti
wishText: Your smile is the brightest star in my universe and your laughter is my favorite melody. May your birthday be as enchanting and full of wonder as the moments we share. Here's to another year of adventures, laughter, and falling a little more for you every day. Wishing you a day filled with love, surprises, and all the happiness you deserve. Happy Birthday!!! ðŸ’–ðŸŽ‚âœ¨
